original_text: If ye then, being evil, know how to give good gifts unto your children: how much more shall your heavenly Father give the Holy Spirit to them that ask him?
korean_text: 너희가 악할지라도 좋은 것을 자식에게 줄 줄 알거든 하물며 너희 하늘 아버지께서 구하는 자에게 성령을 주시지 않겠느냐 하시니라

sentences.original_text: know how to give good gifts unto your children
sentences.korean_translation: 자녀에게 좋은 것을 줄 줄 알거든

sentences.original_text: how much more shall your heavenly Father give
Holy Spirit to them that ask him
